featured.text: Researchers found that commercial popcorn companies often coat their microwave popcorn bags with a 33 called perfluorooctanoic acid (PFOA) which has been found to cause both cancer and lung disease in laboratory animals.

definition.zh_def: 全氟辛酸，一種含氟的有機化合物，常用於工業和消費品中，具有持久性和潛在的環境及健康影響。
definition.en_def: Perfluorooctanoic acid (PFOA) is a fluorinated organic compound used in industrial applications and consumer products, known for its persistence and potential environmental and health impacts.
definition.example: Perfluorooctanoic acid has been phased out in many countries due to its harmful effects on human health.
